summary.span: 提供常规框架 API 和应用程序模型 API，以及许多不同的功能区域通用的各种支持类。

span.span: Provides general framework APIs and application model APIs, and a variety of support classes that are commonly used by many different feature areas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间文档包含仅.NET 投影的投影的 WinRT 类型与不同的 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 类型。This namespace documentation contains only .NET projections of Windows Runtime (WinRT) types where the projection differs from the WinRT type. 若要查看此命名空间类型的完整列表，请参阅[Windows.UI.Xaml](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml) UWP API 参考。To see the complete list of types for this namespace, see [Windows.UI.Xaml](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml) in the UWP API reference.
